text: 148 is a whole number. It comes after 147 and before 149. == Basic facts == *Even number: 148 is even because it can be divided by 2. *Composite number: It has more factors than just 1 and itself. *Prime factorization: 148=2×2×37 == More number facts == Sum of eight consecutive integers: 15+16+17+18+19+20+21+22=148. == Roman numerals == In Roman numerals, 148 is written as CXLVIII. == Binary form == In binary (base 2), 148 is 10010100. Category:Integers
title: 148 (number)
